mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, SESSION_ID, PLAYER_ID, BEST_LAP, SECTOR1, SECTOR2, SECTOR3, CAR_MODEL, TRACK_SEQ FROM TB_RECORD WHERE PLAYER_ID = #{playerId} AND SESSION_ID = #{sessionId}
SELECT SEQ , SESSION_ID , PLAYER_ID , BEST_LAP , SECTOR1 , SECTOR2 , SECTOR3 , CAR_MODEL , TRACK_SEQ FROM TB_RECORD_GT4 WHERE PLAYER_ID = #{playerId} AND SESSION_ID = #{sessionId}

SELECT ROUND(@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1) AS RANK, D.* FROM ( SELECT C.SESSION_ID, TP.FIRST_NAME, TP.LAST_NAME, TP.STEAM_AVATAR, TC.CAR_NAME, TC.CAR_MODEL, C.BEST_LAP, C.SECTOR1, C.SECTOR2, C.SECTOR3, C.TRACK_SEQ, B.LAP_COUNT, TT.TRACK_NAME, TT.TRACK_VIEW_NAME, B.PLAYER_ID FROM (SELECT MIN(A.BEST_LAP) AS BEST_LAP, A.PLAYER_ID, SUM(A.LAP_COUNT) AS LAP_COUNT FROM TB_RECORD A WHERE A.PLAYER_ID = #{playerId} GROUP BY A.TRACK_SEQ) B INNER JOIN TB_RECORD C ON B.PLAYER_ID = C.PLAYER_ID AND B.BEST_LAP = C.BEST_LAP INNER JOIN TB_TRACK TT on C.TRACK_SEQ = TT.SEQ INNER JOIN TB_PLAYER TP on C.PLAYER_ID = TP.PLAYER_ID INNER JOIN TB_CAR TC ON C.CAR_MODEL = TC.CAR_MODEL ORDER BY SESSION_ID DESC ) D, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) E

SELECT ROUND(@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1) AS RANK, D.* FROM ( SELECT C.SESSION_ID , TP.FIRST_NAME , TP.LAST_NAME , TP.STEAM_AVATAR , TC.CAR_NAME , TC.CAR_MODEL , C.BEST_LAP , C.SECTOR1 , C.SECTOR2 , C.SECTOR3 , C.TRACK_SEQ , B.LAP_COUNT , TT.TRACK_NAME , TT.TRACK_VIEW_NAME , B.PLAYER_ID FROM (SELECT MIN(A.BEST_LAP) AS BEST_LAP , A.PLAYER_ID , SUM(A.LAP_COUNT) AS LAP_COUNT FROM TB_RECORD_GT4 A WHERE A.PLAYER_ID = #{playerId} GROUP BY A.TRACK_SEQ) B INNER JOIN TB_RECORD_GT4 C ON B.PLAYER_ID = C.PLAYER_ID AND B.BEST_LAP = C.BEST_LAP INNER JOIN TB_TRACK TT on C.TRACK_SEQ = TT.SEQ INNER JOIN TB_PLAYER TP on C.PLAYER_ID = TP.PLAYER_ID INNER JOIN TB_CAR TC ON C.CAR_MODEL = TC.CAR_MODEL ORDER BY SESSION_ID DESC ) D , (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) E

SELECT C.PLAYER_ID, C.BEST_LAP, C.SECTOR1, C.SECTOR2, C.SECTOR3, C.LAP_COUNT, C.TRACK_SEQ, TT.TRACK_NAME, TT.TRACK_VIEW_NAME, TP.FIRST_NAME, TP.LAST_NAME, TP.STEAM_AVATAR, TC.CAR_NAME, TC.CAR_MODEL, C.SESSION_ID FROM (SELECT A.SEQ, B.PLAYER_ID, MIN(B.BEST_LAP) AS BEST_LAP FROM TB_TRACK A INNER JOIN TB_RECORD B ON A.SEQ = B.TRACK_SEQ GROUP BY A.SEQ, B.PLAYER_ID) B INNER JOIN TB_RECORD C ON B.SEQ = C.TRACK_SEQ AND B.PLAYER_ID = C.PLAYER_ID AND B.BEST_LAP = C.BEST_LAP INNER JOIN TB_TRACK TT on C.TRACK_SEQ = TT.SEQ INNER JOIN TB_PLAYER TP on C.PLAYER_ID = TP.PLAYER_ID INNER JOIN TB_CAR TC ON C.CAR_MODEL = TC.CAR_MODEL ORDER BY TRACK_SEQ DESC, BEST_LAP

SELECT C.PLAYER_ID , C.BEST_LAP , C.SECTOR1 , C.SECTOR2 , C.SECTOR3 , C.LAP_COUNT , C.TRACK_SEQ , TT.TRACK_NAME , TT.TRACK_VIEW_NAME , TP.FIRST_NAME , TP.LAST_NAME , TP.STEAM_AVATAR , TC.CAR_NAME , TC.CAR_MODEL , C.SESSION_ID FROM (SELECT A.SEQ , B.PLAYER_ID , MIN(B.BEST_LAP) AS BEST_LAP FROM TB_TRACK A INNER JOIN TB_RECORD_GT4 B ON A.SEQ = B.TRACK_SEQ GROUP BY A.SEQ , B.PLAYER_ID) B INNER JOIN TB_RECORD_GT4 C ON B.SEQ = C.TRACK_SEQ AND B.PLAYER_ID = C.PLAYER_ID AND B.BEST_LAP = C.BEST_LAP INNER JOIN TB_TRACK TT on C.TRACK_SEQ = TT.SEQ INNER JOIN TB_PLAYER TP on C.PLAYER_ID = TP.PLAYER_ID INNER JOIN TB_CAR TC ON C.CAR_MODEL = TC.CAR_MODEL ORDER BY TRACK_SEQ DESC , BEST_LAP

SELECT SESSION_ID, A.PLAYER_ID, B.BEST_LAP, B.CAR_MODEL, TC.CAR_NAME, A.TRACK_SEQ, TP.LAST_NAME, TP.FIRST_NAME, TP.STEAM_AVATAR, TT.SEQ, TT.TRACK_VIEW_NAME, TT.TRACK_NAME FROM TB_RECORD A INNER JOIN ( SELECT TRACK_SEQ, MIN(BEST_LAP) AS BEST_LAP, CAR_MODEL FROM TB_RECORD WHERE CAR_MODEL = #{carModel} GROUP BY TRACK_SEQ ) B ON A.BEST_LAP = B.BEST_LAP AND A.CAR_MODEL = B.CAR_MODEL INNER JOIN TB_PLAYER TP on A.PLAYER_ID = TP.PLAYER_ID INNER JOIN TB_TRACK TT ON TT.SEQ = A.TRACK_SEQ INNER JOIN TB_CAR TC ON TC.CAR_MODEL = B.CAR_MODEL

SELECT SESSION_ID , A.PLAYER_ID , B.BEST_LAP , B.CAR_MODEL , TC.CAR_NAME , A.TRACK_SEQ , TP.LAST_NAME , TP.FIRST_NAME , TP.STEAM_AVATAR , TT.SEQ , TT.TRACK_VIEW_NAME , TT.TRACK_NAME FROM TB_RECORD_GT4 A INNER JOIN ( SELECT TRACK_SEQ , MIN(BEST_LAP) AS BEST_LAP , CAR_MODEL FROM TB_RECORD_GT4 WHERE CAR_MODEL = #{carModel} GROUP BY TRACK_SEQ ) B ON A.BEST_LAP = B.BEST_LAP AND A.CAR_MODEL = B.CAR_MODEL INNER JOIN TB_PLAYER TP on A.PLAYER_ID = TP.PLAYER_ID INNER JOIN TB_TRACK TT ON TT.SEQ = A.TRACK_SEQ INNER JOIN TB_CAR TC ON TC.CAR_MODEL = B.CAR_MODEL
